title: Schedule of Judge Sotomayor's Capitol Hill meetings today, 6-24-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 24, 2009

 



Schedule of Judge Sotomayor's Capitol Hill meetings today, 6-24-09




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  _________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                           June 24, 2009    SCHEDULE OF JUDGE SOTOMAYOR’S CAPITOL HILL MEETINGS  WEDNESDAY, JUNE 24th   Today, Judge Sotomayor will visit Capitol Hill to meet with the following Senators: Senator Evan Bayh (D-IN)  Senator Mark Begich (D-AK)  Senator Tom Harkin (D-IA)  Senator Mark Pryor (D-AR)  Senator John Thune (R-SD)
